input.sentences: i had to look through all of the menus .
i do n't know why the restaurant had so many menus .
but i did n't want to miss anything .
it took me hours to read through them all .
output.sentences: The restaurant menus made for fun collector's items.
Steve treasured his collection, which had taken a long time to compile.
Every time he went to a restaurant, he asked to take a menu with him when he left.
He also liked collecting local advertisements of interest to him.
His collection was large and growing.
